snippet: A town planning minister, Moussa Mara, will become prime minister, a presidential spokesman said on state television late on Saturday.
abstract: Mali's entire government steps down after Prime Min Oumar Tatam Ly submits government-wide resignation; he will be replaced by Moussa Mara, town planning minister.
lead_paragraph: A town planning minister, Moussa Mara, will become prime minister, a presidential spokesman said on state television late on Saturday.

headline.main: Full Government of Mali Resigns; Premier Is Named
headline.print_headline: Full Government of Mali Resigns; Premier Is Named
